campaign.story:
"Then war broke out in heaven. Michael and his angels fought against the dragon, and the dragon and his angels fought back. But he was not strong enough, and they lost their place in heaven. The great dragon was hurled down—that ancient serpent called the devil, or Satan, who leads the whole world astray. He was hurled to the earth, and his angels with him."

The deck is inspired by the War in Heaven from the Book of Revelations.  Each suite matches a specific angel with a corresponding demon according to their rank in the hierarchy.

What we are trying to convey in our story is that there are always more than one perspective in all he things that we go through in life. Two sides of the same coin, the darkness that comes with the light. Just like the war in heaven in the Book of Revelation. We fight our angels and demons everyday.

During these times, when we all have to go through so many challenges, we want to shed light that with the gains comes the loses. Sometimes we rise like the angels in heaven, while other times, we fall like the devils.

This deck doesn't highlights only one side, rather how we can relate to both sides. We hope this gives an overview of what we want to convey through our artwork and design. 

We want to give credit to Nicolai Aaroe Culminus deck for the inspiration and being one of the best game changers in the playing card design and campaigns. 

We also want to give credit to Wylie Beckerts Wicked Kingdom Deck that inspired to challenged us to create intricate artworks for our card face and the idea to sell her original prints. 

We also want to give a special mention for those whom we are inspired from in this campaign. Steve Mint Anubis & Osiris Deck, Marianne Larsen Circus Deck , Joker and thief Deck and Charmie dreams the cats Bastet the Cat Deck. There is so much more people we wish to mention, thank you for creating wonderful decks that has inspired so many others. 
★ Angels vs Demons deck based on the War in Heaven
★ Limited edition (Only 2,500 Decks)
★ Deluxe copper foil on tuck exteriors
★ Embossed tuck boxes with two designs
★ 100% unique pips & courts illustrations
★ Custom numbered seals placed on tuck bottoms
★ 52+2 poker sized cards
★ Printed by LPCC
★ Fulfilled by Gamblers Warehouse
There will be two kinds of tucks available in this edition:  the Gehenna and Lux Bellator. The Gehenna tuck is dedicated to the Demons' side and Lux Bellator is dedicated to the Angels’ side. 

Gehenna is taken from the Hebrew Bible that is said to be a place where the wicked are headed to. It is not the same as Hell as it is said to be more of a waiting room or a purgatory for those to atone and think of their sins. We want to convey that even if demons fall to hell that there is always hope for those who are ready to atone for their sins. 
Lux Bellator is latin for 'Light Warrior' we thought it would be a good contrast to the fact even Lucifer was once a 'Light Warrior'. One can be evil by nature or nurture and in this case even Angels who are born of pure light can fall. 'Light Warrior' depicts the angels as who they are, a warrior of the light and the defender against darkness. 

The solid tuck boxes of War in Heaven will be manufactured with hot-stamped and embossed artwork on all sides.  There will be a numbered seal on the bottom on each tuck box. 
The Gehenna tuck box is going to be manufactured with a dark grey colored stock and the artwork will be black and embossed on all sides.  The wording is then hot stamped with copper foil. We chose copper as it has a symbolic meaning in our eyes. Copper can be readily customized, it can be made by combining other metals into one. It has a property that is aligned to our deck which is that in life we can be stronger when combined with many other experiences. We wanted to recreate a dark summoning scene for this deck, which is why there are snakes surrounding the demons’ sigil for summoning on the back of the deck. The snake is hand drawn and inked, which is then scanned and digitally integrated into the backs design. The snake depicts the serpent in this narrative that we are telling. 
The Lux Bellator tuck box is going to be manufactured with cream white stock and the artwork will be hot-stamped copper foil. We want to give the tuck a feel of purity, reflecting the holy power of the Angels. In the Abrahamic religion, Angels are often referenced and represented by its divine light. We want to visualize the deck to have this divine light in its design by giving it angelic wings that replaces the serpent in the back design. We also picked copper foil on this design as even Angels has it's own kinds. There are many different Angels in the Hierachy of Angels such as: Seraphim, Cherubim, Thrones, Dominations, Virtues, Powers or Authorities, Principalities or Rulers and Archangels. Which will appear in our face cards.
Inspired by Nicolai Aaroe’s tuck seal, we placed the seal on the bottom so it wouldn’t be broken by use.  Each box will be numbered and be hot-stamped with copper foil. 

Each card face depicts two combatants of matching rank in the War in Heaven. Our concept is to try to visualize a reenactment on who will the demons and angels fight against during the war.  We visualized and stylized the angels, along with their corresponding demons. There are many different Angels in the Hierachy of Angels such as: Seraphim, Cherubim, Thrones, Dominations, Virtues, Powers or Authorities, Principalities or Rulers and Archangels. And there are many ranks of demons such as: Lucifer, Leviathan, Satan and Belial, Astaroth, Maggot, Asmodee, Beelzebub, Oriens, Paimon, Ariton (Egin) and Amaymon. There are also lesser demons such as: Demons of fate, Incubus, Succubus, Wandering groups or armies of demons can include multiple regions in hell, Familiars, Drude, Cambions and more. These creatures will also make an appearance in our deck. 

While the Lux Bellator’s card faces radiates hope and blessings from God, the Gehenna’s conveys a demonic chaos. Each character has its own narrative, stories, legends and origins.  Light versus Dark - whose side will you choose? Or can we relate to both these sides from our struggles in life? or even, in reality can we even choose a side when fate might brought us to see in both sides perspective. This was the reason of our pairing, to not only just compare the two characters but to also see their similarities. For some pairings they may even have the same origin as Angels. 
As time passes, we will reveal the card faces and introduce our cast in each court. Every design is hand-drawn, inked and digitally colored skillfully by Silvana S. We will eventually let our backers buy our real hand-drawn and inked illustration. Please look forward to this! 
Once we reach a $15,000 stretch goal, we plan to make the backs hot-stamped with foil. We believe in their quality and ability to manufacture the deck the way we designed and hope for it to achieve its true potential.
The number cards will be identical in illustration.  If we reach the stretch goal of $18,500, we will make the pips use metallic ink.  We will reveal more designs in the coming months, please be sure to check back! 
This is the preview of what the Ace of Diamonds will look like. More ace suites will be revealed soon. If we reach the stretch goal of $18,500, the pips will be using a copper pigmented metallic ink. Copper can be readily customized, it can be made by combining other metals into one. It has a property that is aligned to our deck concept which is that in life we can be stronger when combined with many other experiences wether from the dark and light side.
Add-ons are optional rewards that lets backers easily select additional items that are not included as part of the main reward tier they selected.  These add-ons will be limited to Kickstarter only; we don't plan to remake them for our personal shop.  The prices are directly shown in the descriptions of the pictures for single purchases and they will affect the shipping rates of your rewards.  Please note you must pick a main reward first before you can select any add-ons.

Sigil Totem Coin 
The War in Heaven sigil totems are two inches (50mm) in diameter and have copper coins of the same size.  The Sigil Totem coins are shown as below and are included in the Collector’s Edition and Deluxe Editionpledge tier. We would also like to explain that these are two side of the same coin (they are not two different coins). They cost CAD$25 per coin. 
War in Heaven Booklet 
The War in Heaven Booklet is perfect if you want a deeper knowledge of the stories behind each face card’s pairing.  They also include larger, more detailed prints of each face card.  The War in Heaven Booklet is CAD$19.
A3 Posters
Choose your favorite face cards and have exquisitely detailed A3-sized posters of them.  Display at home or gift them to friends and loved ones!  Please message us to let us know your chosen illustration.  You can indicate your choice in your Backer’s Survey after the campaign.  Each A3 Poster costs CAD$12. 
Original Drawing
Choose your favorite face cards and have the original drawing to be yours. The original drawing will be signed by the illustrator and have a certificate of authenticity. Each Original drawing costs CAD$345.
We will also ask for you opinion to vote on some of these stretch goals once unlocked. We want to include our backers in our journey in the creation of this deck. As we wouldn't be able to achieve any of this without our backers support and feedbacks. 
We are using Gambler Warehouse as our fulfillment center and LPCC to produce our deck. Another company will produce our posters, booklets and coins.
To know more about our work and who we are, please check our Instagram account. Feel free to message us if you have any questions or concerns.  We also welcome all feedback!

About Us
We are a small design team that fell in love with board games and playing cards. Each of us are experienced designers in the creative industry. We have experience in creating complex projects from ideas into real life and hope to create products that backers would love in this platform. We aim to be meticulous in our process and designs to create the best products for our backers. We want to create something we would absolutely love and share it here. One of the project we have helped created before is called "The Cute Cat Tarot". It gave us insights on how to run a project in this platform. Paired with the years of experience we have in the creative industry we are confident to give you the best playing card deck we can make. If there is any questions or concerns feel free to message us!

Our Team
Illustrator - Silvana N. S. 
Project Manager - Sonia Febyola 
Copywriter & Editor - Michael

Risks and challenges
We are aware during these uncertain times timelines could get delayed especially in the manufacturing and shipping phase. We have reached out to Gambler Warehouse before this project and consulted with them on the possible issues. We plan to regularly update our backers and be as communicative as possible towards every progress or news.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
London 1843. The construction of Big Ben begins, but there are already many bells tolling long echoes through the dark streets of London. These narrow streets are inhabited by suspicious figures that cast long shadows. A thief, a beggar, a prostitute, a corrupt politician and his cunning wife. All sceptical and scheming about the intentions of the shadowy figure right around the corner and at the end of the street.
★ 19th century Victorian London theme
★ Embossed tuck boxes with gold/silver foil + TUCK INTERIORS UNLOCKED!
★ Exclusive to Kickstarter backers & www.isolatedthunderstorm.com
★ Limited edition (print run is 2,500 for each edition)
★ Custom, numbered tuck seals
★ 52 poker sized playing cards + 2 unique diptych jokers
★ Metallic gold/silver ink on card backs 
★ Printed by TWPCC (LPCC/EPCC) 
★ Self-fulfilled by Isolated Thunderstorm 
The Pennyless tuck has a gloomy scenery printed in a matte material with a striking silver foil and an embossed title that brings the poor people of the Victorian streets to foreground. This tuck is designed to set the tone and atmosphere of the theme. It has a fully custom stamp-like, numbered tuck seal. 
The Pennyless number and face cards are designed in a one-way format for an art-focused layout on the character illustrations. These characters are drawn by hand in collaboration with professional illustrator Patrick Leis and feature characters inspired by Victorian archetypes, like the brothel owner, the night watchman and the roughneck on the docks.
Pennyless diptych jokers
With these illustrations I am building on the thematic representation of London in the Victorian Era. Victorian society was organized hierarchically. While race, religion, region and occupation were all meaningful aspects of identity and status, the main organizing principles of Victorian society was gender and class.
The Moonshine tuck is manufactured in a horisontal format with a black soft touch stock for a truly exquisite victorian feel. The tuck exterior is adorned with intricate and detailed gold foil on all sides, inspired by luxury brand tobacco- and matchbox packaging from the time period. It has a fully custom stamp-like, numbered tuck seal. 
The Moonshine number and face cards are designed in a classic two-way layout with index in all four corners for optimised playability. The court cards are drawn by hand in collaboration with professional illustrator Patrick Leis and feature characters inspired by Victorian archetypes, like Jack the Ripper, Dr Jekyll, Sherlock Holmes and others.
With the Pennyless diptych scenery I want to illustrate a rough and poor district, while the Moonshine diptych scenery represents an upper class mercantile main street. I hope you'll find an interest in the contrasts and the stories they tell.
On the Shadows of London card backs you will find details such as Victorian street lamps, gate spikes, floral damask and the Big Ben clock tower.
Pledging for 6 or 12 Shadows of London decks you will have a standard box included in your reward, to hold them. These boxes come in two sizes (fitting either 6 or 12 decks) and they are designed to match the vintage paper boxes of the era. The boxes are CMYK printed in a cardboard quality similar to the popular brick boxes of my Circus Playing Cards. If you choose the deluxe or "T&G" variant of these boxes it will come with an elegant gold foiled dustcover as seen in the images above. 

You can add a standard edition Shadows of London box to your pledge, regardless of which pledge tier you have. They come in two sizes, holding either 6 or 12 decks of playing cards. To add a half brick box, simply add +150 DKK to your pledge or add +175 DKK for a full brick box, then please send me a private message to confirm your choice of add-ons. NOTE: Some pledge tiers already have a box included.

 Shadows of London Add-ons 
The Shadows of London silver and gold coins are manufactured in antique silver / gold and with a large diameter of 2 inches (50mm). The two sides have different designs as shown above. Add +149 DKK for 1 coin or +279 DKK for both. See below how to apply add-ons.
The Shadows of London booklet is ideal for you if you want to enjoy the face illustrations along with some text about the Victorian era in London. This is a printed booklet in horisontal A6 format. To grab one booklet, simply add +99 DKK for 1 or +159 DKK for 2 booklets to your pledge, and send me a private message to confirm your choice of add-ons.
The Shadows of London deck pouches are designed to fit one deck of cards each and are manufactured in imitated black suede quality in two variants: An iconic Victorian street lamp in silver and the Big Ben clocktower in gold. Add +30 DKK for 1 pouch or +55 DKK for both pouches. See below how to apply add-ons.
You have the option of adding on additional Shadows of London decks to your pledge. Add +95 DKK for each extra deck (Pennyless or Moonshine edition). Please let me know via PM (private message) how many decks you would like to add. In some cases a change of shipping category may also comes into effect depending on your pledge tier.

Circus add-ons
You also have the option of adding on some items from my Circus Playing Cards project. These are manufactured with numerous deluxe features and delivered to backers with great reviews. I have very few of these left in stock so it is of great importance that you send me a private message if you would like to add on one or more of these decks to your pledge reward so I am able to keep count. See the add-ons prices below.
Add +319 DKK for 1 deck of the Circus Playing Cards (Black Mosquito or Deluxa edition).

You can add an empty Circus box to your pledge, regardless of which pledge tier you have. They come in two sizes, holding either 6 or 12 decks of playing cards. To add a half brick Circus box, simply add +150 DKK to your pledge or add +175 DKK for a full brick box, then please send me a private message to confirm your choice of add-ons. 

Add +149 DKK for 1 Circus Gold Coin or +279 DKK for both coins (bear or clown). 
Add +99 DKK for 1 Circus booklet or +159 DKK for 2 booklets.
Add +30 DKK for 1 Circus pouch or +55 DKK for a set of both pouches (clown or bear).

How to apply add-ons
To apply one or more add-ons, you must increase your pledge with the indicated value via the "manage my pledge" button while keeping the same reward level. You must then send me a private message for specification of your chosen add-on(s) while the project is still funding on Kickstarter. If you have any doubts or questions in relation to how add-ons work you are more than welcome to send me a private message. I won’t be using BackerKit or any other post-funding pledge manager to apply add-ons after the funding has ended on Kickstarter. In some cases a change of shipping category may also come into effect depending on your pledge tier and choice of add-ons.
A huge THANK YOU to you all! It is amazing how well this project is received!
That is also why I am excited to reveal the already unlocked THREE STRETCH GOALS to accommodate the success of your support!
Tuck interiors unlocked!
Pennyless ed. tuck interior will have an old and dark map of central London from the Victorian era. You can see how the river Thames squirm through the city center and also sense the iconic Green Park, Hyde Park and St James Park.
Moonshine ed. tuck interiors will be a dark, mysterious and luxurious black foil!
Metallic inks on card backs unlocked!
Additionally, I think you'll be pleased to learn that it doesn't stop here. The next stretch goal is set at 325.000 DKK and it will be unveiled if the project manages to raise this amount.
Pennyless diptych joker artwork
Moonshine diptych joker artwork
Since 2014 I have increasingly been involved in projects here on Kickstarter; with only growing interest in this kind of creativity that reaches so many people worldwide. Furthermore, for a number of years I’ve been running my own bookstores and I’ve always loved the good story!

                             In many ways, a playing card pitch here on Kickstarter is about portraying “a good story” via pictures in a creative and visually strong theme.

                             During 2018 I begun working exclusively with creative projects and many of these involving playing cards. As head manager of Design Imperator you may already know me from projects like Ragnarok, Helheim and Deus Vult Playing cards.

                             I’m also and with great joy running www.isolatedthunderstorm.com which were founded in 2018. Now I’m thrilled of being back here at Kickstarter trying on my own ideas once again and make them grow into launching my second brand new playing card project, which I sure hope you’ll like as well!
Cheers, Marianne
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
My previous deck projects - Chivalry, Midgard, Ragnarok, Helheim, Deus Vult, Circus and Norse Medals (fulfilment April this year), were all successfully funded on Kickstarter and received with great reviews from mine and our audience and supporters. What is presented to you with Shadows of London is based on extensive research, experience as creator and my devotion to exemplary execution. For the project I’ve set a very conservative development timeline to ensure a thorough and flawless fulfilment for all backers. TWPCC I know from having proved their quality and attention to detail with numerous previous playing card projects and therefor I feel completely confident in the collaboration with them. 

As experienced project creator, I’ve brought many complex products to the audience on time and with very positive feedback. However, obstacles can arise unexpectedly. Potential set-backs include production delays, shipping and sourcing issues. The fulfilment plan has buffers implemented to counter for potential mishaps as much as possible. As usual all rewards are shipped according to professional recommendations by danish Postnord, Deutsche Post and DHL and again I’m handling the fulfilment process myself to make sure that everything goes as planned and because I simply like it! 

I have much experience with the shipping companies and have used them for several years, also for isolatedthunderstorm.com parcels, to send thousands of parcels, big and small. I therefor have every reason to believe that all rewards will be delivered to you as intended. Please note that I can’t not be held responsible for any damaged, lost, unclaimed or destroyed parcels. It is crucial that you enter your address correctly in the survey after the project has ended and that you pick up your parcel when your local mail distribution is ready to deliver it to you. Since experience tells me that some decks, regardless to which country they are sent, can have an unexpectedly long delivery status and/or customs processing. 

I need to ask for your understanding, that it may (in rare cases) take months, from the time of dispatch, to the actual delivery to the recipient. If the reward itself does not live up to a high quality control and pass my condition inspections I’ll return it to the facility and demand a re-production. IF this should happen, some delay in the fulfilment process can occur and I hope for your understanding in such event. Note that these playing cards are primarily intended as pieces of art and not necessarily manufactured for magicians, cardists or similar high performance use. 

All presented design and artwork is subject to minor tweaks and changes. Brick boxes will be printed by another company (not TWPCC)
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear backer,
Here follows my second project update since Shadows of London funded successfully on Kickstarter.

CURRENT STATUS

Dear backers, 
Many more backers have joined our Shadows of London project since my last update.
This has resulted in the third stretch goal being reached, which unlocks a unique set of diptych style joker illustrations for both editions!

Dear backers!

Thank you! There is now 618 backers supporting my Shadows of London project and this gives us a nice potential for the unlocking of even more stretch goals. The next stretch goal will be unveiled if the project manages to raise 325.000 DKK (we are currently at 310.000 DKK).

Dear backer
Congratulations to us all!
Another stretch goal has been reached for Shadows of London, which means that tuck interiors have been unlocked for both editions - this is all thanks to your support!

Dear backer!
Once again, WOW - a huge THANK YOU to you all! It is amazing how well this project is received! 
That is also why I am excited to reveal the already unlocked first stretch goal to accommodate the succes of your support:
Metallic inks on card backs

campaign.story:
★ A dark, occult theme based on the 17th-century witch-hunt
★ Limited edition (2,500 of each edition)
★ Deluxe copper/red/black foil on tuck exteriors + interiors.
★ Embossed tuck boxes with unique seals
★ Special texture tuck stocks
★ 100% unique pips & courts illustrated in hand
★ Custom, numbered seals placed on tuck bottoms 
★ Metallic ink with gold pigment 
★ 57 poker sized cards (52 cards + 3 extra + diptych artwork)
★ Printed by NPCC with premium linen finish
★ Exclusive to Kickstarter backers & www.isolatedthunderstorm.com
★ 5 STRETCH GOALS UNLOCKED!  
The solid tuck boxes of Vengeance of Witches are manufactured with hot stamped copper, red and black foil and deep, embossed artwork on alle sides. Both editions have a numbered tuck seal applied on the tuck bottom. Manufactured with exclusive tuck stocks that are sure to honor the spirits of the forest!
The Caccabus tuck box is manufactured with a black, soft-touch stock which is embossed on all sides. Copper foil and black/UV varnish is used in combination to honor the spirits of black magic and archaic energy. UNLOCKED BONUS: UV glow in black light. 
The Hagazussa tuck box is manufactured with a brown, soft-touch stock that is embossed on all sides. Copper, black and red foil is hot stamped in combination to form the elements of witchcraft on the front and a chilling, burning cross on the tuck back.  
No tearing of the seals, no disturbance of the Gods. The numbered tuck seals of Vengeance of Witches are positioned at the tuck bottoms and displaying the unique number for each deck out of the 2,500 print run. I was inspired by Marianne Larsens Circus Playing Cards for this idea of bottom seal placement.
The face cards feature archetypes inspired by the 17th-century witch-hunts. Illustrations are drawn by hand by professional artist Nicolai Aaroe. The women are named (as apposed to the men) as they are the main characters of this theme and story. Characters are identical in the two editions, but aces and jokers are unique.
In the Caccabus edition, the hearts and diamond suits are red. Here, the cards have an old and worn look with no background pattern. See below for a comparison of the card fronts between the two editions.
In the Hagazussa edition, the hearts and diamond suits are printed with metallic copper ink. The cards have an old and worn look with a decorative background pattern. See below for a comparison of the card fronts between the two editions.   
The backs of Vengeance of Witches feature intricate artwork printed with metallic copper inks and blood red accents in pantone. Caccabus edition has rich black tint, while the Hagazussa edition has a dark, brownish tint. Both editions have a 'no border'/full bleed design.    
Drowning, fire, madness, dismay, this is how we see the 'vengeance' in play. The aces of Vengeance of Witches are 'curses on the puritans' designed by the elements of witchery and archaic elements of black magic: air, water, earth and fire. Each edition has 4 unique curses. 
The aces of Vengeance of Witches are my own edits of historic, stock imagery acquired under creative commons license. I give all credit to the original artists. 
Index and layouts are identical in the two editions, but the tint, color of pips and background pattern varies between them. See below for a comparison of the card fronts between the two editions. 
Caccabus edition
Hagazussa edition
Included exclusively and FOR FREE in the half or full brick pledge tiers comes a branded brick box to store your decks with style. Added decks are not included in this arrangement. These boxes will be CMYK-printed in a black paper stock similar to the Vittoria Di Venezia brick boxes, and fit either 6 or 12 decks (depending on your pledge tier).   
Customise your pledge tier with exclusive add-ons. Just like the decks themselves, these are all available in a limited supply. Some of these may potentially sell out fast and will be removed from this list if/when it happens. The prices below is representing the addition of one unit, unless stated otherwise. Shipping may be influenced depending on your pledge tier. See below how to apply add-ons. 
The Vengeance of Witches spirit talisman and hex amulet are large, metal copper coins with a diameter of 2 inches (50mm). The two sides have different artwork as shown above. Both the spirit talisman and hex amulet are already included in the discounted ´Collectors Edition´ pledge tier. To grab one of them, simply add +149 DKK to your pledge, or +279 DKK for them both. Please send me a private message to confirm your choice of add-ons.
The Vengeance of Witches booklet is ideal for you if you want to enjoy the face illustrations in a bigger format while reading about the witch-hunt of the early modern era. This is a printed booklet in A6 format. 
The Vengeance of Witches deck pouches are designed to fit one deck of cards each and are manufactured in black satin with a copper foil icons. Both the spirit and alchemy pouches are already included in the discounted ´Collectors Edition´ pledge tier. Add +30 DKK for 1 pouch or +55 DKK for two both pouches. See below how to apply add-ons.   
You can add a Vengeance of Witches box to your pledge, regardless of which pledge tier you have. They come in two sizes, holding either 6 or 12 decks of playing cards. To add a half brick box, simply add +150 DKK to your pledge or add +175 DKK for a full brick box, then please send me a private message to confirm your choice of add-ons. NOTE: Some pledge tiers already have a box included.  In some cases a change of shipping category may also come into effect depending on your pledge tier.
How to apply add-ons
To apply an add-on, you must increase your pledge with the indicated value via the "manage my pledge" button while keeping the same reward level. You must then send me a private message for confirmation and specification of your chosen add-on(s). If you have any doubts or questions in relation to how add-ons work you are more than welcome to send me a private message. I will not be using BackerKit or any other post-funding pledge manager to apply add-ons to your pledge.  In some cases a change of shipping category may also come into effect depending on your pledge tier.
So, how do the two editions compare to each other, when lined up side by side?  The devil lies in the detail:
Besides the card backs, the decks differ from each other by having unique aces and jokers. The hearts and diamonds suits are red in Caccabus edition and golden in Hagazussa edition. On top of that, the Hagazussa edition has a background pattern, while the Caccabus cards fronts have a simpler, yet still worn and old look. Futhermore, the 'tarot style' labels have a different color scheme in the two editions. 
I would like to acknowledge your amazing support by adding a diptych scenery to both editions of Vengeance of Witches. The diptych artwork is formed of two bonus cards that are designed to add thematic atmosphere to the project. Depending on which edition you have pledged for, the cards shown below will be implemented automatically as a free expansion for all backers of the project. You don't have to do anything to get this bonus.
CACCABUS DIPTYCH: 
In the diptych scenery for the Caccabus edition, a twisted male corpse lies in front of a doe and her kid. The witch-finder senses that this is some unearthly curse and not simply a terrible accident.
HAGAZUSSA DIPTYCH: 
In the diptych scenery for the Hagazussa edition, a female channels archaic energy to set a building on fire. The retribution for the local witch-trials has begun.
 But it doesn’t stop here. I have plans for more stretch goals and the next one will be unlocked at 480.000 DKK so stay tuned for more news on that! 
The second stretch goal has been unlocked and with it comes a printed 'face card character portrait' for all backers in A6 format. This portrait will be chosen at random between the 12 face card characters and added to all pledge tiers automatically and for free for all backers of the project. On top of being a portrait, the backside will have a 'thank you text' from me. So I am pleased for this extended opportunity to express my gratitude to you as backer. No action is required from your side to get this portrait. It is not possible to get a specific character illustration, they will all be picked at random for every backer.
With the third stretch goal I will be adding a bonus card to both editions FOR FREE, which will be introducing the story behind the theme. The theme and idea may be very fresh and obvious to every backer here today, but once the decks are delivered, opened or handed as gifts I think it adds a wholesome value if the owner is able to read a few words to understand the contents of the deck better or refresh memory. Both the Caccabus and Hagazussa edition now feature a total of 57 cards!
Caccabus bonus: UV glow
I am now upgrading the black varnish of the Caccabus tucks to a more expensive UV varnish that has a very special characteristic that will make it glow in the dark when exposed to ultraviolet/black light. In normal lighting the tucks will still appear exactly as presented and this change will not take away anything from the current look and feel - it will simply add the new special glow feature automatically and FOR FREE for all backers of the Caccabus edition, which is only visible in black light.
Here is an example of what you can expect from this UV glow feature. Please note that this is a digital mock-up and the actual look may differ slightly from what you see here. My Vittoria Di Venezia tucks were also manufactured with this UV feature. A glow in the dark! 
Hagazussa bonus: metallic ink
The metallic ink with copper pigment has been a default feature for the card BACKS from day one, but with this stretch goal all the card FRONTS of the Hagazussa edition will now ALSO have copper pigmented ink as well! You'll notice all the golden numbers, frames and particularly the hearts and diamonds suits. All of these elements will now be printed with a more expensive metallic ink and it will be noticeable in comparison with any other deck printed with standard (CMYK) inks. This ink upgrade is applied automatically and FOR FREE for all backers of the Hagazussa edition.
This in a digital mock-up to simulate that I am now upgrading from the CMYK printing to the more advanced Pantone ink additions. But the actual difference can not be replicated on a computer screen. That is just how it is with Pantone inks. The effect of the ink with copper pigment is somewhat over exaggerated in this example, to make sure highlight what the feature upgrade is about.
In reality the metallic effect does not catch your attention as much as in this example or like a metallic foil, but you WILL feel that there is something a bit more interesting about this ink for sure. Many of my previous decks also have such metallic ink on the backs and faces as well, so I am really happy with the fact that the Hagazussa edition will now match them with this feature. 
Caccabus bonus: tuck interior
With the fifth stretch goal I am adding an exclusive tuck interior to both editions, as a free bonus for all backers of the project. For Caccabus, the interior will have witches' chanting in theban script, manufactured with a glossy black varnish against the matte black stock. For Haggazussa, the tuck interior will have a black foil with a 'pushthrough' pattern, that will reveal brown pentagrams in the gabs.
Hagazussa bonus: tuck interior
As the lead artist of several, succesful deck projects I am no novice in the world of fine art playing cards. I have in-depth knowledge on most printing companies and the strengths and weaknesses of each. I design dark art playing cards that are meant to be treated as such. I am an avid backer on Kickstarter and know how things work, on both sides of the table. 
Vengeance of Witches is my most ambitious project to date and I have invested quite a significant sum of my profit from earlier projects to give it the attention that it deserves. These playing cards are designed and presented as fine art playing cards and neither designed nor produced for cardistry or other advanced handling.  
Vengeance of Witches will only be made with your support to help cover the costs of investments, setup fees, proof charges, printing, design, freight, shipping and the time to create all the pieces of art. I am launching this deck on Kickstarter as an artist, a deck collector, and an active fan of the crowdfunding concept. Let's do this together and create something unique! 
Any excess stock from my projects are offered exclusively at Mariannes online shop www.isolatedthunderstorm.com. Do check it out if there is something you miss in the above list of available add-ons in this project... or if you simply want to explore an assortment of other rare and unique decks and coins!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my seventh Kickstarter project and I know how things work. All presented features have been technically confirmed and formally quoted by NPCC prior to launching this kickstarter. 

My lastest project, Vittoria Di Venezia, was manufactured by NPCC and completely lived up to my high ambitions of quality. I have much reason to use them again for Venegeance of Witches. I've spent many months researching, designing and budgetting. However, unexpected obstacles can arise. Potential set-backs include production delays, shipping and sourcing issues. That being said, I feel absolutely confident in my tested suppliers and the conservative timeline I've chosen. Buffers are added to the development plan because I would love to deliver all rewards as promised, if not before. 

As an experienced graphic designer, I've brought many complex products to my audience on time and with great feedback. There's nothing more important for me than getting your rewards delivered on time and as advertised. Please note that customs MAY open your deck(s) during shipping and thus break the factory sealing/cellophane. These are standard procedure checks to make sure that the parcel contains only legal items, and I hope for your understanding in such event. Shipping is handled with Deutsche Post and sent with tracking ID on all parcels. Any additional customs charges potentially applied to your reward during shipping is out of my hands. Please note that I can't be held responsible for any damaged, lost, unclaimed or destroyed parcels. 

It is crucial that you enter your address correctly in the survey after the project has ended. I can take no responsibility in the actual delivery of your package, therefor requests such as “Knock loudly on the blue door” is strictly between you and your local mail service. If you have experienced troubles in receiving parcels from abroad I encourage you to establish a contact to your local postal service closer, but prior to fulfilment of this project. Returned parcels with the reason “not claimed” can always be resent to you against a shipping fee. Experience tells me that some parcels, regardless to which country they are sent, can have an unexpectedly long delivery status and/or customs processing. I therefor need to ask for your understanding, that it may (in extremely rare cases) take months from the time of dispatch to actual delivery to the recipient. 

Note that these playing cards are primarily intended as pieces of art and not necessarily manufactured for magicians, cardists or similar high performance use. The cards are made of German Premium Casino Linen, 310g. Design and artwork is subject to minor tweaks and updates. Brick boxes will be printed by another company (Not NPCC)
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: F.A.Q.+ Shadows of London by Marianne Larsen
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
Thanks for working with me on filling out your surveys! I have received many questions and messages, so this update is mainly going to be covering these in the form of an F.A.Q.

I hope for your understanding that backers have different interests and priorities and I fully respect that. My goal is to complete the mission with the highest possible satisfaction.

Dear backers,

       In extension of my last updates, I have spent countless hours trying to work out a plan that accommodates the interests of all sides of the table. I have important news.
  THERE WILL BE TWO CACCABUS TUCK VARIANTS

Dear backer!

I really appreciate your supportive comments, though it is painful to see a strong indication that I wasn’t clear enough about the unshakeable facts in my last update.

Just to be clear, this is how NPCC just went ahead and mass produced the Caccabus decks. NPCC gave me the impression that they would solve the UV ink issue, but the compromise they decided on wasn't shared with me and it is not the route that I would have taken. The mass production turned out this way and I never had an opportunity to change that since I wasn't even informed that a cosmetic sacrifice would be unavoidable.

Dear backer,
After weeks of transit, the long awaited Caccabus production samples have finally reached me. I will need to assess a couple of things and evaluate the overall situation before I am able to provide more concrete information of the next step in the project. 
I will post the next update before long!

Dear backer!
This is just a quick and short update to tell you that a completed Caccabus deck is currently in transit to me for approval. It is a sample that is sent for personal inspection and technical approval by me. (As you might know, the Caccabus edition was delayed in production). I just didn't want to hold back this update because it has been a while since I updated you last and I have been awaiting this sample shipment for quite a while already...

campaign.story:
THIS 3-WEEK CAMPAIGN IS A FOLLOW-UP FOR THIRD, STRETCH GOAL DECK FROM WALHALLA COLLECTION. IT IS SET TO BE PRODUCED TOGETHER WITH ORIGINAL PROJECT DECKS AND COMBINED FULFILLMENT FOR ORIGINAL PROJECT BACKERS. ALL BACKERS WILL START RECEIVING THEIR REWARDS IN END NOVEMBER.
Walhalla is the German form of Old Norse Valhöll, which is commonly anglicized as Valhalla. In Norse mythology, Valhalla is an enormous and majestic hall in Asgard, presided over by Odin.
Described as a "warrior's paradise", it is here that the souls of those who are slain in battle go, chosen and guided by the Valkyries, a group of warrior maidens in service to Odin. 
Valkyries choose those who may die in battle and those who may live. Selecting among half of those who die in battle, the valkyries take their chosen to the afterlife hall of the slain, Valhalla, ruled over by the god Odin. There, the deceased warriors become einherjar (Old Norse "single fighters"). When the einherjar are not preparing for the events of Ragnarök, the valkyries bear them mead. Valkyries also appear as lovers of heroes and other mortals, where they are sometimes described as the daughters of royalty, sometimes accompanied by ravens and sometimes connected to swans or horses.
Limited edition
Transparent security holographic foil and invisible ink on tucks 
Embossed tuck boxes w. custom seals
Deluxe tucks with special paper stock
100% custom design of cards, pips and tuck
SPECIAL UV& INVISIBLE inks on card faces and backs
54 poker sized cards (52+2 jokers)
Savings on each deck with higher pledges
All decks shipped to backers in protective boxes
Presenting you a Deck of Valkyries. Because of strong interest to it, and inspiration that we received during original Walhalla campaign that was successfully funded just recently, we've decided to release this deck, third and final from the series!
Deck of Valkyries tuck is feature packed: layer of special half-transparent holographic foil, embossing, and selective varnish that also glow under UV:
PLAY

Walhalla Set Under Normal Light
Walhalla Set Under UV LIght
Deck of Valkyries Front Under Normal Light
Deck of Valkyries Front Under UV
Deck of Valkyries Back Under Normal Light
Deck of Valkyries Back Under UV Light
Here is a short video how transparent holography look:
PLAY

Deck of Valkyries Tuck Front Design
Deck of Valkyries Tuck Back Design
Besides amazing features of tuck box, Deck of Valkyries cards also has a special neon and invisible inks that glow under UV! Exactly the same inks are used for production of money bills and highly secured blanks. And now, for the first time ever, we are bringing this technology to playing cards! Here is glowing paint sample preview, to give you an idea how it will look on cards:
PLAY

Spades and Clubs are designed in blue and green neon inks, while Hearts and Diamonds - red and orange. Comparing to original Walhalla, this deck's card faces were tuned to match unique color scheme and make this concept work:
 We also offer Deluxe 3-Deck Case for whole set. It is made of black stock and feature gold-foiled Walhalla logo in front:
Walhalla 3-Deck Set Deluxe Case
Walhalla 3-Deck Set Deluxe Case
 This Deluxe Case isn't available only in complete set, but also may be added separately. Please see ADD ONS section for more information.
This project represents third deck from original Walhalla campaign, that was recently funded. More information about these decks can be found in Walhalla project description.
Deck of Odin and Deck of Freyja are available as add ons and as a part of complete set of decks for new and returning backers.
Deck of Odin (Orange) & Deck of Freyja (Black)
Deck of Odin
Deck of Odin Jokers
Deck of Odin Back Design
Deck of Freyja
Deck of Freyja Jokers
Deck of Freyja Back Design
Walhalla Sticker Set
Original Walhalla project page
$15,000 Two Security UV Color inks (red for hearts and diamonds and blue for spades and clubs)
$20,000 Invisible ink on tuck interiors
1x Deck of Valkyries - $16 for US/international backers 
1x Deck of Freyja - $16 for US/international backers
1x Deck of Odin - $16 for US/international backers
1x unfolded tuck (Freyja/Odin/Valkyries) of your choice - $5 for US/International backers
3-Deck Deluxe Box - $15 for US/international backers
3x Stickers (Set) - $5 for US/International backers
1x Dealer Coin - $15 for US/International backers
3x Dealer Coins - $40 for US/International backers
6x Dealer Coins - $75 for US/International backers
12x Dealer Coins (Set) - $140 for US/International backers
Designing playing cards had been for a long time on Riesen Design's to do list and here they finally are! The goal was to create a set of beautiful and practical cards that are fun to play with. The theme for this poker-sized pack came once again from European history and mythology: the usual kings, queens and jacks have been replaced with gods and goddesses from the Nordic pantheon. Do you recognize them? Their names are written in runes on their left shoulder...
The characters on the face cards are also not exact mirror image of each other: can you find the three differences in all of them?
PRODUCTION IS ALREADY SCHEDULED AND WILL START IN END OCTOBER. For those backers, who supported original Walhalla project - rewards from both campaigns will be shipped altogether.
Fulfillment is scheduled to start end November - beginning December 2019.

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
We are excited to share coins! They have arrived and ready to be shipped to those of you, who ordered them.

Hello backers,
Yes, we know that it's been a while since last update. And now, finally, we have another thing to share with all of you: Production of tuck boxes is now complete! NPCC have sent us final tuck boxes samples so we could evaluate and approve them.

Dear backers,
Sorry for being quiet for some time, did not wanted to post updates without any significant progress. But today is the day we can finally share the progress with you - cards have been printed! As you know, they feature invisible inks, and because of also pretty complicated design we had to make some adjustments and additional tests before going to final production. Here is the previews of uncut sheet:

Dear Backers,
First of all, we would like to thank every one of you for an AMAZING support! Deck of Valkyries turned out big success!
Now, few important things we would like to announce:
1. Reward Surveys

Dear Backers,
First of all we would like to thank every one of you for FANTASTIC support that you’ve showed! Project has been funded in less than 3 hours after launch! More than $7,000 raised in first 24 hours! This is just unbelievable! 
For those who haven’t noticed it yet - we’ve added Stretch goals! First one - 2 Colors of Security UV inks: Red for hearts and diamonds and Blue for spades and clubs. And second stretch goal is for invisible ink design inside the tuck (interior).

project_data.project_name: Walhalla Playing Cards: Deck of Valkyries

campaign.story:
$ 13 500 - funding goal - FUNDED!  
$ 17 500 - Ephoros Edition Deck with all features UNLOCKED!
$ 22 000 -  Special Card of Amazons Queen for Ephebes Deck UNLOCKED!
$ 26 000 - Special Card of Amazons Queen for Ephoros Deck
$ 30 000 - Interior Tuck of both decks
  Amazons Spartans is the first deck from the new series, created by Sviatoslav Pashchuk. Although I have completed 5 projects on Kickstarter, this is the first deck to be printed by USPCC. Therefore, the quality of card performance must be of the highest standard.
The work on the design and art of this deck took almost a year. The idea of making a deck dedicated to the Amazons arised a long time ago because these women warriors were a real historical fact. When creating the heroines, I did not try to strictly adhere to any rigorous historical reconstructions and costumes, but tried to imagine how beautiful these ancient warriors could have been. However, the characters' costumes and weapons are almost authentic. I made every effort to get really high quality cards and boxes, the most meticulous detailing and decoration.
Found my true inspiration in the Kunsthistorisches Museum Wien (Art History Museum) near the Amazons Sarcophagus.
The tuck box has its own insignia - it has the symbols of the shield and the spear, the minimal architectural components, as well as the Latin expressions of that era.
This deck will be the first in series of female Amazons. So far, the next two decks will be dedicated to Amazons Samurais and Amazons Vikings. This deck has 2 editions - Ephebes and Ephoros. Ephoros edition is the stretch goal - when unlocked you can choose any edition in your pledges.
Main features:
Printed by USPCC
Golden, Green and Black foils on the tuck box
Embossing on the tuck box
Custom Tuck Box, cards and back
Linen Finish
Classic Paper
Ephoros Edition Deck as a goal
This edition will be available after stretch goals unlocked. This edition has another color scheme of the tuck box and the back. The face cards look more rough. 
How to use add-on list?  
Press “manage my pledge” and increase the total sum using the prices indicated in add-on lists. Please message what items you added in the private message.  
Note that there won’t be pledge manager when the project ends. You will be additionally asked about your choices in project’s surveys.  
If you have any questions on this - please contact through PMs. 
Posters are available in formats A3 and A2. Frame not included.You can choose any poster from the available cards. Posters are to be sent separately in the tubes.
A2 format poster
Also we offer you to buy the decks from previous campaigns. These were produced by NPCC and can be ordered using the add-on list. 
Please note that Golden Age sets are only 1 in stock - Please message if you choose this set. 
As we're going to print the Amazons in US and fullfill by Gambler's Warehouse, the decks from previous campaings will be sent separately in early December 2019 from Ukraine.  
Golden Age set. Not available.
Set of four El Recuerdo decks. Limited by 60.

If you have any questions on this - please contact through PMs. 
Seventh Nation Atelier Team

This is the first time we're going to print the cards in the USA remotely and to send your card through fulfillment company Gamblers Warehouse. However, we do believe that there won't be any problems as we deal with professionals in this field. 
There are always risks related to production delays, shipping and sourcing issues, but there's nothing more important for us than getting your rewards delivered on time and as advertised.
Colors in the final design may vary from those you see on your screens.

updates.update_userinfo: Shadows and Dust Playing Cards project on Kickstarter - less than 48 hours left!
updates.update_content: Hi to all! Maybe you missed our new project dedicated to Roman Gladiators. You still have a chance to become part of something unique and marvellous! Last days of Shadows and Dust Playing Cards project on Kickstarter - less than 48 hours left. And we still have amazing gilded decks in leather cases, and cool collectible stone boxes with metal handles. Don’t miss exclusive stuff! Click on link https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2115236027/shadows-and-dust-playing-cards?ref=6je80w

Dear friends,
This week all the decks will be shipped!
We’re shipping from USA by our partner Gambler’s Warehouse. As soon as shipped you will receive email from GW.
Waiting for your comments when received!

Dear all,  
 At last we have good news! USPCC opens on 11 May and we continue printing. Hope we even meet the deadlines and start sending in June!  We kindly ask those of you who had doubts about supporting our new project, to support it now. We have less than 4 days left. The link is here.

Dear friends,  Today we launched new project on KS. Like Lightning deck is available now through this link:  http://kck.st/39TPF0q   We’re still waiting for USPCC to get back on track and hope the Amazons cards will be printed in April. When printed, Gambler’s Warehouse start fulfillment ASAP. Both USPCC and GW are very reliable partners, we have no concerns you receive your decks as soon as the situation with COVID-19 stabilizes.   Kindly ask you to support my new project!  Stay safe,   Best, Sviatoslav

updates.update_userinfo: The first photos of tuck boxes!
updates.update_content:
Dear friends,

Hope you, your friends and family are all keeping well!

This update is to keep you informed on the current status of the project implementation. Yesterday I was informed that we have little delay in printing of cards since USPCC plant is shutdown till early April 2020 due to COVID19. But hopefully things go well soon and we will meet the deadline or move them slightly.

The good news is that boxes are ready and here are some photos. Can’t wait to get these too!

Dear all! Long time we didn't make any updates, but everything goes well and we almost finished all technical discussions with the printing company and soon we hope to get cards and decks printed. At this moment we adhere to the deadlines and keep you informed for further steps!

Dear friends, while KS is processing payments, we’re preparing all the files to continue communication with the printing company.
As for now we decided to launch a project with Amazons on the Indiegogo. For you this is an additional possibility to purchase Amazons and other decks from previous projects.  
https://www.indiegogo.com/project/preview/aa4b03f9
The project on Indiegogo will go live tomorrow:
Los Angeles 10am PST
NY 1pm EDT
London 6pm GMT+1?

Dear friends,
Thank you for the congratulations and all support provided during this campaign!
Despite we have some pledges canceled during the project, extra card for both decks will be printed!
Less than 12 hours and 300$ to the next stretch goal - additional card with gorgeous Amazon woman! Let’s do it!

campaign.story:
Loving this project? 
Help to support by sharing it with your family and friends! Together we can make it a reality.
Click Here to share it on Facebook. See us on Instagram, Here 
Click Here to share it on Twitter. See us on Instagram, Here
UPDATE:  We transitioned from Might and Magic to Blood and Beast.
UPDATE: Illustration transition will be updated shortly.
Blood & Beast is a movie inspired cards from the lord of the rings and the hobbits.
These awesome deck features four main fantasy factions , Elves, Dwarf, Human, and monster. Although the characters are highly fictional, many of the symbolic patterns are based on the real ancient civilization. You may spot some along the way ~
Blood & Beast is a limited edition unique piece, ONCE SOLD, ITS GONE. not solely of its originality and creativity but also, its one of a kind high-end features:
Excited yet ? Scroll down to immerse yourself and prepare to indulge your inner hero ~
The tuck boxes of Blood and Beast are manufactured with hot stamped gold and silver foil and deep, embossed artwork on all sides that wraps around the tuck box, one of a kind,
Dark Dragon Entity wraps around the tuck in embossed silver foil, inspired by the mosaic-kind-of-art style. The ancient encryption stamped below the Blood and Beast is an Elder Futhark runes which translate to "Silver Edition".
Light Dragon Entity wraps around the tuck in embossed gold foil. The golden dragon represent light-the better side of the dark dragon, which symbolizes the balance of power. The runes encryption is written in Elder Furthark which translate to "Gold Edition". 
Embossed, metal foiled side panels, One side of panel is embossed the name Blood & Beast, making you a proud owner of the deck. The other panel has a wrap of dragon facade. 
Might and Magic tuck seals are representation of each edition, embossed in silver metal finish. Tuck seals are numbered individually for all backers of the project and given accordingly to respective edition. ( This tuck seal is unlocked )
The interior of the tuck has hidden old encryption from ancient Egypt. The side of the card is gilded with metallic silver ink.
( Note: I uploaded the high-quality images for everyone to checkout. Click here. )
 Hidden encryption inside the box will also be uploaded.
The court cards feature classic heroes from the four factions fantasy, the Elves,Dwarfs,Humans and monster heroes. Illustrations are hand-drawn by our passionate artist. All characters are named and represented differently than actual movie to prevent copyright issue. All card has written Elder Furthark runes at both sides translated based on its own faction.
Two iconic Might Magic dragons symbolising the good and the bad
Aces Gems Stone ( Humans-Elves-Dwarfs-Monster )
( Note: I uploaded the high-quality images for everyone to checkout. Click here )
The backs of Gold edition (Light Dragon) and Silver edition (Dark Dragon), feature artwork inspired from ancient pattern and encryption of mixed culture from Chinese to Greek and Aztec a-like designs, both set in a mirrored composition.  The patterns is filmed with silver pigmented ink and gold pigmented ink. These card backs will look striking with metallic inks! 
Aztech inspired entity symbol representing each Silver and Gold Decks
Classic suits of hearts, clubs, diamonds and spades with twisted design to enhance and optimized play-ability. Might and Magic cards gives off a great medieval vibes, which will look great on wooden table.

Blood and Beast's Black Core Material is extremely waterproof and durable
Light Dragon Gold Edition
Dark Dragon Silver Edition
Gems' Factions
Blood and Beast decks are releasing its own exclusive B&B iconic duo dragons miniature that can be found on the joker cards and the facade of the tuck box. These high detailed miniatures are only made in limited number. Model will be retouch up before manufactured.
Dark Dragon Model is LOCKED, until Stretch Goal is unlocked
The model is around 100mm in diameter, made from resin. Perfect for your desk.
Light Dragon ( Gold Edition ) 3D View.
The Deck Pouches are designed to accommodate a single deck and are manufactured in brown and maroon color. The pouch are also limited edition, a fixed number is made and that is it. We hold exclusivity for every backers at upmost priority. ( red sold out )
Two exclusive pouch for Might and Magic deck
We are still looking to have more cool Add-ons along the campaign in progressive manner!  Feel free to give any suggestion on new add-ons in mind. Stay tune for updates !
How to apply add-ons
To apply an add-on, you must increase your pledge with the indicated value via the "manage my pledge" button while keeping the same reward level. You then proceed to send us a private message for confirmation and details on your chosen add-on(s). 
If you have any doubts or questions regarding on how to add-ons, you are more than welcome to send us a private message. 
Link: @kingofcheat   @ericardistry  @our_paper_planet  @emilysleights52  @zombieflourish  @kard.ology  @mzcards   @eliteshitcollection  @cardistryplanet
Your support means a lot and is to be returned favorably. We will be dropping weapons aids to our heroes allies along the way. Here's the overview: 
1st Bronze Spear: A6 Founder Card
All backer of Might and Magic, will receive a printed card in A6 format with introduction and special notes from the founder. A legitimate sign of an authentic backer.
2nd Bronze Spear: Light Gundalf Card
The classic wizard dude! Yes it is ! Every backer of the project will receive a special bonus card of the Light Gundalf. This bonus card will be included in all decks.
3rd Bronze Spear: Dark Gundalf Card
For every Greatness, there is always the imbecile to spice it up. Not forgetting the Dark Gundalf. This bonus card will be included in all decks.
4th Silver Spear: Premium Tuck Seal - UNLOCKED
Every great piece is incomplete, until a final touch is added and that is going to be the premium tuck seal specially designed for this deck. All decks will be included.
 5th Silver Spear: Heroes Story Scripts
All backers of the project will receive a special scripts of the heroes' stories. 
6th Golden Spear: Dark Dragon Model
A rare dark looming dragon is reappearing itself ! Now all backers are eligible to get their hands on this Dragon for a fraction of its value.
Can't wait to unlock them all?
Help to support by sharing it with your family and friends! Bigger Blood & Beast community means, everyone gets to enjoy more surprises and awesome perks.
Click Here to share it on Facebook. See us on Instagram, Here       
Click Here to share it on Twitter. See us on Instagram, Here
Hall of Fame - Underdog Supporter

Purely Idea is small group of passionate designer and artist, aiming to bring unique and exclusive products to everyone with your support. With all the design varieties in the market, offering card decks, we want to set the bar high above with our exclusive fantasy playing cards that will outshine other cards collection. But it is only going to become a reality with your trust, and support.
Our Team is looking forward to the success of this project and to bring many other awesome products regardless of the project size for everyone to enjoy. It is just the beginning and we are always looking for possibly bigger projects in future !
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Blood and Beast are created with superior quality above everyone else in mind.
Timeline has been set to buffer any mishappening, so all fulfillment should be met as within stipulated dateline.

We would like to be completely honest and transparent because the relationship between you and us are at top priority to prevent miscommunication. However, obstacles can arise unexpectedly. Potential setbacks include production delays, shipping, and sourcing issues. 

We are shipping all rewards according to professional recommendations by SingPost and will handle the fulfillment process ourselves to make sure that everything goes as planned. We have much experience with the shipping company and have used them for sending hundreds of packages to our customers. 

Do take note that we are not to be held responsible for any missing and damaged parcels.

Since experience tells us that some decks, regardless to which country they are sent, maybe opened along the way by custom-check ( we have no power on this ) can have an unexpectedly long delivery status and/ results in bad packaging.However, we will try our best to impliment extra safety measures by using protective wraps to prevent potential damage. 

Nonetheless, we will always review every circumstance and cater a solution for the best interest of our customers.

We have a trusted manufacturer where quality is ensured. Nonetheless, in the case of mishappening, we, PurelyIdea, guarantees all backers that we will only demand the best quality that is presented and nothing less of promised.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
1.Wooden Playing Cards Cabinet
As a card magician or cardist，we always have many playing cards on table，the practice decks、gimmick decks、collection decks and more.But the table is in chaos.
So we design the Playing Cards Cabinet to keep your decks in order. But more than that.
*Made By North American Black Walnut
As the most popular high-grade furniture material,black walnut is not only high quality, but also the symbol of high status.
That is why the Louvre of Europe, Versailles palace, Buckingham Palace, and other palaces royal family aristocracy antique furniture is mostly made of American black walnut.
In a way, this cabinet will be a mini luxury piece of furniture in your house.
*Perfect Detail
Semi-enclosed design allows you to locate your playing cards easily and you can take the cards more conveniently because its scientific dimension design.The corners was polished carefully, the handle is smooth and delicate.
 22.1 x 15 x 9.9 cm. Can hold 15 deck at the same time. 
Keep your decks in order.Locate and take your playing cards easily.
Made By North American Black Walnut,it will be a mini luxury piece of furniture in your house.
You can build your own playing cards corner，when you buy more than one.
 -Build your own playing cards corner!
 2.Crystal Playing Cards Cabinet 
20 x 10 x 13 cm. Can hold 15 deck at the same time.
Scientific dimension design allow you to take the decks more convenient.
A great way to display your decks of cards and to find the one you need! 
The same quality acrylic as the TCC crystal card case.
 3.Wooden Support  For Playing Card
As more and more people collect playing cards,how to show and share your collection has been a problem.We also tried to design a support that can show your noble playing cards.
Select north American black walnut with matte finish.
Polish the corners carefully, the handle is smooth and delicate.
At the bottom of the card slot with 25 ° Angle design.
4.Crystal Support For Playing Card
How to strengthen the sense of ritual in the magic performance when you show your prediction card or envelope？Just put on the table?——No!
After continuous modification and improvement of the design，we come up the  crystal support！Not only it can display a deck， but also your prediction card/envelope.
Made by highest quality acrylic.
10cm height with a 7.5cm round base.
The edges are polished and feel smooth.
Display your collection of cards / prediction card / envelope.
A phone support to let your hands free when you watch tutorial.
Please add 
HK$274 for per Wooden Playing Cards Cabinet
HK$234 for per Crystal Playing Cards Cabinet
HK$94 for per Wooden Support
HK$70 for per Crystal Support  
pledge for an Add-On all you need to do is:  
1) go to the project page and click on the "Manage Pledge" button;  
2) scroll down until you find the pledge that you have backed;  
3) add HK$ 274/234/94/70 to the amount that you have pledged, change the amount in the field to this new amount, making sure to erase the original amount first;  
4) Click on the Next button, and continue as you did the first time you pledged.
If you have any questions at all, please don't hesitate to ask me!

campaign.story:
► Limited edition (print run is 2.000 decks of each) 
► Metal copper foil on tucks
► Embossed tucks
► Printed tuck interiors
► Numbered tuck seals
► 2x2 bonus cards unlocked
► 56 poker sized cards (2 jokers)  
► Printed by NPCC
► S.T.A.L.K.E.R.-inspired theme
► Savings on each deck with higher pledges
► All rewards shipped in protective boxes and with tracking ID
The Wolves edition has a slight golden color scheme with iconic rail tracks on the tuck box. The tuck is embossed, copper metal foiled and has a red, numbered seal applied.
Wolves Playing Cards
The Crows edition has a cool grey color scheme with the iconic Pripyat ferris wheel on the tuck box. The tuck is embossed, copper metal foiled and has a yellow, numbered seal applied.
Crows Playing Cards
The tuck boxes of Wolves & Crows of Chernobyl are printed on sturdy paper with embossing and metal copper foil. Even the tuck interiors have printed artwork as seen below. Each deck has a unique, numbered tuck seal. 
Wolves edition tuck box
Wolves edition tuck interiors
Crows edition tuck box
Crows edition tuck interior
The Wolves & Crows of Chernobyl are those who dare to put their own existence at great risk by venturing deep into the Exclusion Zone in the search for valuable artifacts. The twelve jacks, queens and kings are all portrayed as daring, male survivors and explorers. Illustrated by hand  and - so far - identical within the two editions. Cards are printed on higher grade 310gsm german linen finish.
Spades & Diamonds suits (shown here in the Wolves variant).
Clubs & Hearts suits (shown here in the Crows variant).
The aces are designed with a classical layout of a centered, large pip showing for each suit in large format. The two editions have a difference in the overall background tone, but other than that the layouts are identical. 
Aces shown here in the Crows variant.
The pips and indexes are illustrated in a classic, 2-way design with a special Chernobyl font. The two editions have a difference in the overall background tone, but other than that the layouts are identical. Cards are printed on higher grade 310gsm german linen finish.
Wolves edition number cards
Crows edition number cards
The artwork for the card backs is a refined and darker variant of our Chernobyl Memorial Playing Cards. The letters in center banners read 'Chernobyl' in Ukrainian and there are delicate variations in their designs. Cards are printed on higher grade 310gsm german linen finish.
Wolves edition on the left. Crows edition on the right.
Both editions of Wolves & Crows come with a uniquely numbered, stamp-like tuck seal.
Tuck seals (Wolves edition on the left, crows edition on the right).
The pips are designed to match and represent the original (and now heavily weathered) murals found within the abandoned ghost town known as Pripyat. The values and pips are all 100% custom designed and slightly uneven to simulate the rough Zone. 
Pips of Wolves & Crows Playing Cards
The Wolves & Crows half and full brick boxes are designed to look time-worn and old. A fitting box is included automatically if you pledge for 6 or 12 W&C decks.
The dealer coin is a solid metal coin with antique finish. A different artwork on each side. You can add one of these coins for £19 or take 2 for £33.
Digital mockup of the Cheeki Breeki metal coin.
An example of one of our previous metal coins
Our last Chernobyl Memorial metal coins are now exclusively available at isolatedthunderstorm.com.

As a backer of Wolves & Crows Playing Cards, you have the ability to add on some of the decks from our Black Market kickstarter project.
You can add a box from Wolves & Crows to your pledge, regardless of which pledge tier you have. They come in two sizes, holding either 6 or 12 decks of playing cards. 
1 half brick box (6 decks) for +£14 / 1 full brick box (12 decks) for +£16
How to apply add-ons 
To apply an add-on, you must increase your pledge with the indicated value via the "manage my pledge" button while keeping the same reward level. You must then send us a private message for confirmation and specification of your chosen add-on(s). If you have any doubts or questions in relation to how add-ons work you are more than welcome to send us a private message. We will not be using BackerKit or any other post-funding pledge manager to apply add-ons to your pledge.
Wolves edition bonus card
Crows edition bonus card
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our previous three deck projects were funded and all fulfilled with excellent reviews from our backers.

This is our fourth time as deck project managers and we have learned and improved a lot since our previous projects.

We've spent time thoroughly researching, designing and testing these decks. However, obstacles can arise unexpectedly. Potential set-backs include production delays, shipping and sourcing issues. That being said, we feel only confident in our tested suppliers and the conservative development timeline we've chosen. As experienced project creators, we've brought many complex products to our audience on time and with great feedback.

Please note that Misery Development Ltd. is not responsible for any stolen, lost, unclaimed or destroyed parcels. It is crucial that you enter your address correctly in the survey after the project has ended.

We have much experience with the shipping company, Deutsche Post, and have used them for several years. We have every reason to believe that all rewards will be delivered to you. Tracking ID will be applied to all packages.

If the decks do not live up to our intern quality control and pass our condition inspection we will return it to the facility and demand a re-production. If this highly unlikely scenario SHOULD happen, some delay in our fulfilment process is be to expected and we hope for your understanding.

Please note that customs MAY carefully open your deck(s) during shipping and thus break the factory sealing and cellophane. These are random but standard procedure inspections to make sure that your parcel contains what it says on the label. The project budget does not allow us to replace any such inspected decks with new ones, and we hope for your understanding in such event. This happens very rarely.

Design and artwork is subject to minor tweaks and updates. 
Everything you see is a rendered mockup of the final product.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
